# Previous operationalization

## Operational definition

### Defines a construct by specifying the procedures used to measure it

- ### How can we measure happiness? <br> Scores on satisfaction with life scale

- ### How can we measure stress? <br> Scores on perceived stress scale

- ### How can we measure peer engagement? <br> The number of minutes engaging in parallel play or interactive play with peers
